name: The Last Job (alexemagee)
description: Control a crane to deliver crates to a dangerous job site. Avoid obstacles and walls as you search for the delivery site. This game was created by Group 1 in a Fall Semester Video Game Studio. Group 1 members included Alex Magee, Ben Brown, Chris Mercado, Taylor Chojecki, Amy Moynihan, and Peter Kreuter. Enjoy!
